建武: (けんむ) - Kemmu era (of unified Japan) (1334.1.29-1336.2.29), Kemmu era (of the Northern Court) (1336.2.29-1338.8.28)
建玉: (たてぎょく) - position (in finance: amount of a security either owned or owed by an investor or dealer); open interest; outstanding account; sales or purchase contract
建直す: (たてなおす) - to rebuild; to reconstruct
建立: (けんりつ) - (act of) building (temple, monument, etc.); erection
建端: (タッパ) - {archit} height (of a building, etc.); height (of a person, thing, etc.)
建策: (けんさく) - making a plan; recommendation; suggestion
建築史: (けんちくし) - architectural history; history of architecture
建築基準法: (けんちくきじゅんほう) - the Building Standards Act
建築業: (けんちくぎょう) - building (construction) industry; (being in) the building trade
建築業者: (けんちくぎょうしゃ) - a builder
建築様式: (けんちくようしき) - architectural style
建築物: (けんちくぶつ) - a building; architectural structure
建築確認: (けんちくかくにん) - building certification; building confirmation
建築費: (けんちくひ) - building expenses; construction costs
建築面積: (けんちくめんせき) - building area
建網: (たてあみ) - fish trap; set net
建蔽率: (けんぺいりつ) - building-to-land ratio; building coverage ratio; land coverage; site coverage
建言: (けんげん) - right to speak; offering one's opinion to one's superior; proposal
建設会社: (けんせつがいしゃ) - construction company
建設労働者: (けんせつろうどうしゃ) - construction worker
建設国債: (けんせつこくさい) - construction debt
建設大臣: (けんせつだいじん) - Minister of Construction
建設業: (けんせつぎょう) - construction industry; construction business
建設業界: (けんせつぎょうかい) - (world of the) construction industry
建設業者: (けんせつぎょうしゃ) - general (civil engineering and construction) contractor
建設残土: (けんせつざんど) - construction waste soil; surplus excavation soil
建設的関係: (けんせつてきかんけい) - constructive relationship
建設省: (けんせつしょう) - Ministry of Construction
建込む: (たてこむ) - to be built up; to be crowded with houses
建造ドック: (けんぞうドック) - building dock (e.g. for ships)
建長汁: (けんちんじる) - Japanese tofu and vegetable chowder
廻す: (まわす) - to turn/to rotate/to gyrate; to circulate/to send around; to surround; to put something to a new use (e.g. leftovers); (after the -masu stem of a verb) ... around (i.e. to chase someone around); to dial (e.g. telephone number); to invest; to gang-rape
廻り: (めぐり) - circumference/girth; tour/pilgrimage; circulation (e.g. of blood)
廻り合う: (めぐりあう) - to meet fortuitously (e.g. running into an old friend); to meet by chance; to happen across
廻る: (めぐる) - to go around; to return; to surround; to concern (usu. of disputes)
廻向: (えこう) - Buddhist memorial service; prayers for the repose of the soul
廻国: (かいこく) - traveling throughout the country (travelling)
廻天: (かいてん) - changing the world/turning the tide; torpedo modified as a suicide weapon (used in WWII)
廻廊: (かいろう) - corridor; gallery; hallway; cloister (i.e. covered walk typically circling a building or garden, esp. in a palace or place of worship)
廻心: (えしん) - (かいしん is Christian; えしん is Buddhist) conversion
廻覧: (かいらん) - circulation (esp. documents); sending round
廻転: (かいてん) - rotation (usu. around something); revolution; turning
廻送: (かいそう) - forwarding; sending on; redirecting (mail); deadheading (train)
廿日: (はつか) - twentieth day of the month; twenty days
廿日大根: (ハツカダイコン) - radish (Raphanus sativus var. sativus)
廿日鼠: (ハツカネズミ) - house mouse (Mus musculus)
弁: (ben) - válvula, fala, língua, conversar, eloquência; dialeto, sotaque, acento; pétala; válvula
弁える: (わきまえる) - to know (right from wrong); to discern; to discriminate; to understand; to bear in mind
弁が立つ: (べんがたつ) - to be eloquent; to have a way with words
弁じる: (べんじる) - to speak; to talk; to argue; to manage; to dispose of; to carry through; to distinguish; to discriminate
弁じ立てる: (べんじたてる) - to speak eloquently; to talk volubly
弁ずる: (べんずる) - to manage; to dispose of; to carry through; to distinguish; to discriminate
